title: santhathamu ninE
sahitya:
santatamu ninnE kOriyini sakala bhAgyadAyini nIvEyani

anupallavi

nindita shatakAma sundara rUpiNi nIkE teliya gAdA nikhila kAraNi

caraNam

vandita munijana bhakta vimOcani vAcAma gOcara mahima vilAsini
skanda gaja janani shankara mOhini cintita dAyaki citkalA mAlini
